A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Marvelous film\, Alot of twists and turns with plenty of pros with only a few cons.\nIt shakes up the Star Wars formula\, much to the chagrin of some die hard fans\, some may even say that it dosen't feel like a classic Star Wars film. (With alot less fan service than TFA)\nBut as a die hard fan myself\, im glad to see the films changing from the standard formula. Im happy not to be stuck in the old days\, making films for the sakes of fan service.
